title: Fiduciary's Sanchez on Investing in a Tortoise Economy (Audio)
itunes:title: Fiduciary's Sanchez on Investing in a Tortoise Economy (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Ron Sanchez, Chief Investment Officer of Fiduciary Trust Company International, with his investment and economic outlook, and finding stocks in a "tortoise" economy.
